projects.title: Hospital Management System in JEE (IT training completion project)
projects.description: The main objective of this project is to develop a website for a hospital in order to provide an efficient and economical way to make appointments and help in all related tasks: management of hospital and doctor schedules, queue management and export of patient appointments

projects.title: Dynamic JEE website for the Advanced Technologies laboratory within the Faculty
projects.description: website for our laboratory of advanced sciences and technologies which brings together the laboratory's researchers in a unified platform. This Website aims to make contributions in several fields by guaranteeing a remarkable evolution and thus guarantees the uniqueness of the information exchanged between them.

projects.title: Creation of a face detection application
